Today in County Sligo, Strandhill is clean and fun at 2 ft @10s WNW with light 2 mph SE winds. Best conditions are on the push from 08:54 to 16:12. Tomorrow, expect a solid increase to 4 ft @12s WNW with light 4 mph N winds, making for a great day at Strandhill and Easkey spots. Day after, conditions ease slightly to 3 ft @11s NW, still offering good surf at Strandhill. Best: tomorrow.
